Title: Offers installment payment plans as an option for persons with violations of toll collection regulations
Summary: Offers installment payment plans as an option for persons with violations of toll collection regulations before having their registration suspended.
LawCode: Amd ยง510, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to offering installment payment plans as an option for persons with violations of toll collection regulations
